EmailTemplate.description: This is to be used when sending group information about the Blue Access for Employers (BAE) portal. You'll need to go to Knowledge and attach: BAE AutoSecurity Training Guide; BAE Forgot Password & User ID & User Profile Reference Guide.
EmailTemplate.name: Education - Blue Access for Employers (to group)
EmailTemplate.subject: Blue Access for Employers (BAE) {!Case.Group_Account_Number__c} - {!Case.Account}
